title: 166: Reviews of Phone Repair Shops
description:
While you're out shopping for Bitch Too Sandy perfume, be sure to pick up Christine's latest book: Costumer Service 101!

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/beachtoosandy!

Get your Warning: Contains Sexy Stuff merch here: https://store.dftba.com/collections/beach-too-sandy-water-too-wet

Logo by Courtney Aventura. Theme by Mavus White.

Music by PSOVOD and tyops.
